EmailTemplate.description: Includes customised survey link (Coveris 4 Week Post Program Survey) in SG3
EmailTemplate.name: Coveris 4 week Application Survey Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: ENSI Case Study Request - Share Your {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} I+N Experiences
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
No doubt you have been applying your {!Contact.Program_Name__c} skills successfully to {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} cases since your ENS workshop on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}.
As part of your program, now is the time when we ask you to share one short example on how you have applied the ENS model in a real-life negotiation situation, preferably your 'Must Win, Can't Fail'. The online survey should take no more than 5-10 minutes to complete and can be accessed here. http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1725351/ENS-Four-Week-Must-Win-Can-t-Fail-Application-Survey?jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c} This link is specific to you, please don't forward to others.
It would be appreciated if you could complete your response by: {!Contact.Job_6_week_case_study_due__c}.
Your ENS facilitator/s {!Contact.Job_Presenters__c}, will review all responses and a report with their feedback will be provided to the group along with everyone's (anonymous) examples. Click here to see a sample report.
We encourage you to invest your time in this just as your company has invested in your development and they will be following up for responses as required.
We look forward to hearing about your 'Must Win, Can't Fail' experiences and to providing you with some more feedback.
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
